name: Get Me to the Church on Time!
description:
Get Me to the Church on Time! is a text adventure which sees the player take the role of one Ernie Spludge. Ernie wakes up at 11:00, hung over after a particularly good stag night. However, this is his wedding day and within an hour or two he has to find his best man, the ring, and get to the church.

This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well as more advanced commands such as EXAMINE BEHIND and USE THIS WITH THAT.

shot.caption: The background story is displayed a paragraph at a time, this is the final story screen.
